content: The Lord Praised for His Goodness.
I will give thanks to the  with all my heart,
In the company of the upright and in the congregation.
Great are the works of the ,
Studied by all those who delight in them.
Splendid and majestic is His work,
He has made His wonderful acts to be remembered;
The  is gracious and merciful  full of loving compassion.
He has given food to those who fear Him [with awe-inspired reverence];
He will remember His covenant forever.
He has declared  made known to His people the power of His works,
In giving them the heritage of the nations.
